item.title: Docs: Install in EKS
item.description:
EKS Kubernetes

Only installations of StorageOS with CSI are supported for EKS.

Visit the [best practices page]( {%link _docs/platforms/aws-eks/bestpractices/index.md %}) for production deployment advice.

 

{% include operator/install.md %}
